CustomField.description: This creates a numerical value for each Purpose picklist value.
CustomField.formula: CASE( Purpose_Detail__c , "1.0 Marketing outreach" , 1.0, "1.1 Suspect attends IntApp event" , 1.1, "1.2 Prospect self-id's to IntApp", 1.2, "1.9 Other Marketing", 1.9, "2.0 Outreach", 2.0, "2.1 Negative response", 2.1, "2.2 Receptive exchange", 2.2, "2.3 On-site first meeting", 2.3, "2.4 Account/Product Profiling", 2.4, "2.9 Other Territory Development", 2.9, "3.0 Opportunity meetings", 3.0, "3.1 Gathering deal data points", 3.1, "3.2 Providing ranges for budget", 3.2, "3.3 Draft Discussion document", 3.3, "3.4 Full/Technical demonstration", 3.4, "3.5 Proposal/RFP response", 3.5, "3.6 References", 3.6, "3.7 Competitive evaluation", 3.7, "3.8 Closed - no decision", 3.8, "3.9 Lost to competitor", 3.9, "4.0 Selected", 4.0, "4.1 Negotiating price, package and terms", 4.1, "4.2 Closed - won", 4.2, "4.3 Right of Return", 4.3, "4.9 Other Opportunity work", 4.9, "5.0 Kick off meeting", 5.0, "5.9 Other Services", 5.9, "6.1 Support Outreach", 6.1, "7.1 Account Management Outreach", 7.1, "7.2 At-Risk Activity", 7.2, "7.9 Other Account Management", 7.9, 9999)
CustomField.label: Purpose Detail Number
